reviews.text: There is a sign on our building says no flyers, etc. You get in the building somehow and throwing flyers into the apartments under doors, that people upset about it. Next  time there will be consequences

Gave this place more than one chance because they have a dish I have a hard time finding. I ignored the food poisoning i got the 2nd time I ordered. But I cant ignore a cooked roach in my shrimp fried rice. Half way through eating I see a cockaroach mixed in my rice. Not like it crawled in at the end, but like it was cooked with the rice. It was my 3rd order from this place. Its going to be a day or 2 until i can stomach food again. Nope. Nope. Nope. Nope. Nope. Nope. Nope.
Rude employees who work while sick. Very stingy with soy sauce, napkins, straws

Easily the worst Chinese takeout I‚Äôve had. I ordered online because it was raining, but the delivery driver refused to bring the food to the porch, so I had to step out into the rain to get it. On top of that, the food was undercooked.
Very rude person that answers the phone and when I‚Äôm in the store they always have people smoking in the front. Not an okay environment

THIS PLACE IS A DISGRACE DISGUSTING
Dirty menus food as terrible as their attitude absolutely DISGUSTING  waste of 40$ DONT EAT HERE IF THEY ARE GIVING IT AWAY !!!!!!!00000stqrs

By far the worst Chinese takeout I ever had. Ordered shrimp with broccoli with egg fried rice. The order was done in a minute, which should‚Äôve been the first sign of something wrong. They were stingy with the hot and soy sauce. Eggs were burnt, only had 4 pieces of shrimp, for some reason it smelled funny. The man who took my order went out and started smoking so the smoke was coming in with the wind and fan. First time I have ever thrown the food out from a Chinese takeout as well. Do not go here.
Used to be my go to for wings,  now the wings are the smallest wings I've ever seen while the price is sky high
Ordered delivery. Small portions bad customer service.
Fast and good portions
The costumer service is horrible, one of the worst I've ever experience.

I just ordered Chicken & broccoli with white rice with another order of chicken wings and fried rice then they proceeded to give me SHRIMP and broccoli (im allergic to shellfish) and when i called to complain, they told me "oh you must've forgot that you ordered shrimp". What a waste of 10 dollars and TIP included.

Also as a customer, I expected to be treated with respect and empathy, but unfortunately, this was not the case. The guy I spoke with was extremely rude. They only care abt the penny from your pocket.

I‚Äôm not sure why all the negatives reviews. I order from here every week. The best chicken wings I have ever had. Also their delivery is very fast. Sometimes i vary from house special fried rice or egg fried rice or vegetable fried rice.‚Ä¶

THIS PLACE IS A SCAM please read, few years ago they were operating correctly. I recently purchased BEEF lomein and was given seasoned pork to look like beef instead. I thought it was a mistake so I ordered it again with the same result a‚Ä¶

If I could give them no stars I would ... I called trying to get some food delivered and this man talk so rudely and hung up the phone on me . When I called back he tried to act like he didn't just do that , so I told him I'm not ordering‚Ä¶
This is the ONLY Chinese take-out in the area that has Mu-Shu Pork. I just tried it for the first time and it was excellent. The wait was worth it because I knew that they were making it fresh.

Food might taste OK. I wouldn't buy food from here again they use their bare hands to pick up everything from food to phone to mop...speaking of mops one of the employees mopped over my sneakers while waiting for my food... How is this place still open??

Just had some egg fried rice and found a fingernail as I was chewing. I made sure it was not anything else before automatically saying it was a finger nail but it definitely was. Very unsatisfying. I called to make a complaint their‚Ä¶

Please note: they are listed on BeyondMenu but they do not actually take online orders! Walk-in or call and cash only. Very confusing experience when I placed an order via the app and then showed up only to have them say they don‚Äôt do any online business at all.

Also docking a star because one of the soup containers (which feel flimsy) has a small hole, thus causing it to leak all over the takeout bag resulting in a very sticky mess when I got home.
Cant go wrong with this chinese spot, great service.

First two deliveries were acceptable. Third attempt was a disaster! Ordered fried dumplings, received STEAMED dumplings, sauce was missing. A gooey, sloppy wet mess with less taste than wet cardboard!Called to request an adjustment, order taker hung up. Called back again, "I don't understand English"!! I will never patronize this dump again!!! Fast service does not mean "Please screw up my order". Thanks for nothing!
Update:  I'm a forgiving soul so I thought I'd give them another chance. Down with the flu so I ordered soup. What do you know, order arrives and soup is missing! I quit!!!
